lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid midfielder Augusto Fernandez suffered knee ligament damage in the La Liga defeat by Barcelona on Saturday, the club said.

headline.print_headline: Atletico's Fernandez Suffers Knee Ligament Damage
headline.main: Atletico's Fernandez Suffers Knee Ligament Damage
